WASD to select in the menu, to control character movement in game
J to confirm, to attack in game
K to cancel, to jump in game
L to dodge.Combined with directional input to dodge with different direction
U to use double Kick attack
Hold Shift/W to glide
Controller （Xbox mapping）：
Dpad to select in the menu, to control character movement in game
A to confirm, to attack in game
B to cancel
X to attack
Y to use double Kick attack (also serve as U in teleport panel)
Lb dodge.Combined with directional input to dodge with different direction
Hold Rb/Up Dpad to glide

ViceLessCity is a Metrovania game. The story happens in a future mechanical city. Player is going to role play
as a detective who lost his memory, using his mind reading ability to discover in the spiritual world, solving
puzzles and recover the memories. This game mixed Metrovania's discover&upgrade feature with detective stories'
mystery and decrypt, as well as having a rounded combat system. Player could enjoy stylished battle on their way
of discovering. 

The game is still in development, first part of the game is estimated to be finished in 2021 spring. To contact, please email daniel.cao18@qq.com

Combat System:

Apart from Hp, there's also heat gauge for player and dizzy gauge for enemies
Player's heat would rise as landing normal attacks, would drop when player is attacked or used a dodge/drop kick. 
The heat cost by dodge and dropkick will be turned into Hp in ratio.
Player's attack rise as heat increased each levels. The damage of drop kicked is not only connected to the level of heat, but also the amount of heat currently hold.
Level 3 with full heat would lead to a very damaging dropkick.
Special attack triggered by directional button + attack will not influence the heat, but can effectively lower enemies' dizzy gauge.

Dizzy gauge is only owned by enemies who own super armor. When it decrease 1/4, this enemy will be knocked for once. When it's emepty, the enemy will be dizzy for 3 sec. Then it will be filled again.

无罪之城是一款类银河战士恶魔城游戏。故事发生在一个未来的钢铁都市里。玩家将扮演一位丧失记忆的警探，用自己独特的读心能力在
精神世界中探索，解决一个个谜团并且恢复记忆。本款游戏融合银河城的探索升级与侦探故事的悬疑揭秘，并有着完善的战斗系统，在探
索的过程中也能体验爽快的战斗。

游戏还处于开发阶段，预计2021年春完成第一部分。欲联系制作团队，请联系daniel.cao18@qq.com

战斗系统详解：

玩家与敌人除了血条以外，还分别拥有热度条和眩晕条。
玩家的热度会随着普通攻击的命中上升，随着遭受攻击，使用闪避和飞踢攻击下降。闪避和飞踢攻击消耗的热度会按一定比例转化为血量。
热度每提升一个等级，玩家的攻击力会上升。其中，飞踢的攻击力不但和热度等级挂钩，也与实时的热度量挂钩。3级热度满热度量的飞踢攻击威力巨大。
和方向键配合使用的特殊攻击不会对热度造成影响，但是能有效的削弱敌人的眩晕槽。

眩晕槽是具有霸体的敌人才拥有的状态槽。每当眩晕槽下降了1/4，敌人会被短暂击退一次。当眩晕槽被清空时，敌人会昏迷三秒。随后眩晕槽会恢复至满。
